section.title: Introduction
section.p: An access controller can be used to authenticate entities and to authorize requests. (See below for more info on authentication and authorization). Lenya ships with the following AccessControllers:

section.title: DefaultAccessController
section.p: The DefaultAccessController combines an Authenticator, an Authorizer, an AccreditableManager and a PolicyManager to perform these tasks.

section.title: BypassableAccessController
section.p: The BypassableAccessController is a DefaultAccessController that can be bypassed for certain URL patterns. For URLs that match those patterns (regular expressions), access is granted for free.
